title: Beelzebub Services Batch
description: Top-level container for a set of honeypot service configurations.

id.description: Unique identifier for this configuration bundle.

description.description: Human-readable summary of what this bundle represents.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this configuration was created or last updated.

LLMPlugin.description: Configuration for integrating a large language model (LLM).

prompt.description: Base prompt to initialize the LLM conversation.

CommandHTTP.description: Rule for handling incoming HTTP requests.

regex.description: Regular expression to match request paths or payloads.

handler.description: Response body or handler name for matched requests.

headers.description: Tuple of HTTP header strings to include in the response.

regex.description: Regular expression to match an incoming SSH command.

handler.description: Text or action to respond with when the regex matches.

plugin.description: Optional name of a plugin to process the command (e.g., 'LLMHoneypot').

ServiceHTTP.description: Configuration for an HTTP honeypot service.

apiVersion.description: API version of the configuration schema.

address.description: Network address and port to listen on (e.g., ':80').

ServiceSSH.description: Configuration for an SSH honeypot service.

apiVersion.description: API version of the configuration schema.

address.description: Network address and port to listen on (e.g., ':22').

cve_tags.description: List of CVE identifiers relevant to exploits targeting this service.

cve_description.description: Description of the vulnerabilities exploited in this service.

passwordRegex.description: Regex for accepted or logged passwords.
